languages.text: {n}Очнувшись, Гордей осекается, слегка краснеет и шумно плюхается обратно на сидение.{/n} "Простите, я... я увлекся. Но зато вы должны понять, какое впечатление произвел этот буклет, попав в руки молодому мне! Я просто не мог думать ни о чем, кроме Футфола. Я готов был жизнь отдать, чтобы увидеть эту невероятную станцию! И, конечно же, как ни отговаривали меня друзья и близкие — я собрал все сбережения и отправился в путешествие".

{n}Emerging from his reverie, he catches himself, blushes slightly, and loudly flops back onto his seat.{/n} "I apologise, I... I got carried away. But you must understand how deep an impression this booklet left on me when my young self picked it up! I simply couldn't think about anything other than Footfall. I was ready to give my life just to see this incredible station! And of course, no matter how hard my friends and loved ones tried to dissuade me, I still gathered all my savings and set out on a journey."
languages.original_text: {n}Очнувшись, Гордей осекается, слегка краснеет и шумно плюхается обратно на сидение.{/n} "Простите, я... я увлекся. Но зато вы должны понять, какое впечатление произвел этот буклет, попав в руки молодому мне! Я просто не мог думать ни о чем, кроме Футфола. Я готов был жизнь отдать, чтобы увидеть эту невероятную станцию! И, конечно же, как ни отговаривали меня друзья и близкие — я собрал все сбережения и отправился в путешествие".

But you must understand how deep an impression this booklet left on me when my young self picked it up! I simply couldn't think about anything other than Footfall. I was ready to give my life just to see this incredible station! And of course, no matter how hard my parents tried to dissuade me, I still gathered all my savings and set out on a journey."

languages.text: {n}夢想から我に返り、ほのかに頬を赤らめて、大きな音を立てて席に戻った。{/n}「失礼しました、つい…熱くなってしまいました。でも、この小冊子を手にした若き日の私が、どれほど大きな影響を受けたのか知っていただきたいのです！もうフットフォール以外のことは考えられませんでした。この素晴らしいステーションをこの目で見ることに命を捧げる覚悟ができていました！もちろん、友人や家族には激しく反対されましたが、かき集められるだけの貯金をはたいて旅に出ました」
languages.original_text: {n}Emerging from his reverie, he catches himself, blushes slightly, and loudly flops back onto his seat.{/n} "I apologise, I... I got carried away. But you must understand how deep an impression this booklet left on me when my young self picked it up! I simply couldn't think about anything other than Footfall. I was ready to give my life just to see this incredible station! And of course, no matter how hard my friends and loved ones tried to dissuade me, I still gathered all my savings and set out on a journey."

traits.locale_text: {n}夢想から我に返り、ほのかに頬を赤らめて、大きな音を立てて席に戻った。{/n}「失礼しました、つい…熱くなってしまいました。でも、この小冊子を手にした若き日の私が、どれほど大きな影響を受けたのか知っていただきたいのです！もうフットフォール以外のことは考えられませんでした。この素晴らしいステーションをこの目で見ることに命を捧げる覚悟ができていました！もちろん、親には激しく反対されましたが、かき集められるだけの貯金をはたいて旅に出ました」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Historian

languages.text: {n}他从沉浸中惊醒过来，微微涨红了脸，倒在座位上，发出了很大的声响。{/n}“我很抱歉，我……我太激动了。但您必须理解，年纪轻轻的我拿到这本小册子时，它给我留下了多么深刻的印象！当时除了落脚港之外，我的脑子里已经什么都装不进去了。我打算亲眼看看这座传奇的星站，就算付出生命也在所不惜！当然，我的朋友和亲人尽他们所能拼命劝阻，但即便如此，我还是收拾了所有的积蓄，踏上了旅程。”
languages.original_text: {n}Emerging from his reverie, he catches himself, blushes slightly, and loudly flops back onto his seat.{/n} "I apologise, I... I got carried away. But you must understand how deep an impression this booklet left on me when my young self picked it up! I simply couldn't think about anything other than Footfall. I was ready to give my life just to see this incredible station! And of course, no matter how hard my friends and loved ones tried to dissuade me, I still gathered all my savings and set out on a journey."

traits.locale_text: {n}他从沉浸中惊醒过来，微微涨红了脸，倒在座位上，发出了很大的声响。{/n}“我很抱歉，我……我太激动了。但您必须理解，年纪轻轻的我拿到这本小册子时，它给我留下了多么深刻的印象！当时除了落脚港之外，我的脑子里已经什么都装不进去了。我打算亲眼看看这座传奇的星站，就算付出生命也在所不惜！当然，我的父母尽他们所能拼命劝阻，但即便如此，我还是收拾了所有的积蓄，踏上了旅程。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Historian

languages.text: {n}Al salir de su ensimismamiento, se recompone, sonroja y deja caer en el asiento.{/n} «Lo lamento, me... he dejado llevar. ¡Pero así se imagina el impacto tan grande que tuvo este libreto en mí cuando llegó a mis jóvenes manos! No podía pensar en algo que no fuera Paso. ¡Estaba dispuesto a renunciar a mi vida simplemente por ver esta estación tan maravillosa! Por supuesto, aunque mis amigos y seres queridos trataran de disuadirme por activa y por pasiva, cogí todos mis ahorros y me di a la aventura».
languages.original_text: {n}Emerging from his reverie, he catches himself, blushes slightly, and loudly flops back onto his seat.{/n} "I apologise, I... I got carried away. But you must understand how deep an impression this booklet left on me when my young self picked it up! I simply couldn't think about anything other than Footfall. I was ready to give my life just to see this incredible station! And of course, no matter how hard my friends and loved ones tried to dissuade me, I still gathered all my savings and set out on a journey."

traits.locale_text: {n}Al salir de su ensimismamiento, se recompone, sonroja y deja caer en el asiento.{/n} «Lo lamento, me... he dejado llevar. ¡Pero así se imagina el impacto tan grande que tuvo este libreto en mí cuando llegó a mis jóvenes manos! No podía pensar en algo que no fuera Paso. ¡Estaba dispuesto a renunciar a mi vida simplemente por ver esta estación tan maravillosa! Por supuesto, aunque mis padres trataran de disuadirme por activa y por pasiva, cogí todos mis ahorros y me di a la aventura».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Historian

languages.text: {n}Sortant de sa rêverie, Gordei se reprend, rougit légèrement et se laisse retomber bruyamment dans son siège.{/n} « Excusez-moi, je... me suis un peu laissé emporter. Mais vous devez comprendre que cet opuscule m'a fait une impression extrêmement forte lorsque j'ai mis la main dessus dans ma jeunesse. Il m'était impossible de penser à autre chose qu'à Castel. J'étais prêt à donner ma vie pour voir cet endroit incroyable ! Et bien sûr, même si mes proches ont tout fait pour m'en dissuader, j'ai rassemblé toutes mes économies et je me suis embarqué dans ce voyage. »
languages.original_text: {n}Emerging from his reverie, he catches himself, blushes slightly, and loudly flops back onto his seat.{/n} "I apologise, I... I got carried away. But you must understand how deep an impression this booklet left on me when my young self picked it up! I simply couldn't think about anything other than Footfall. I was ready to give my life just to see this incredible station! And of course, no matter how hard my friends and loved ones tried to dissuade me, I still gathered all my savings and set out on a journey."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sortant de sa rêverie, Gordei se reprend, rougit légèrement et se laisse retomber bruyamment dans son siège.{/n} « Excusez-moi, je... me suis un peu laissé emporter. Mais vous devez comprendre que cet opuscule m'a fait une impression extrêmement forte lorsque j'ai mis la main dessus dans ma jeunesse. Il m'était impossible de penser à autre chose qu'à Castel. J'étais prêt à donner ma vie pour voir cet endroit incroyable ! Et bien sûr, même si mes parents ont tout fait pour m'en dissuader, j'ai rassemblé toutes mes économies et je me suis embarqué dans ce voyage. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Historian

languages.text: {n}Irgendwann taucht er aus seiner Tagträumerei wieder auf, errötet ein wenig und lässt sich laut auf seinen Stuhl fallen.{/n} "Verzeiht, ich ... ich habe mich mitreißen lassen. Aber Ihr müsst verstehen, welch tiefen Eindruck das Büchlein bei mir hinterlassen hat, als mein junges Ich es erstmals las! Ich konnte an nichts anderes als Footfall mehr denken. Ich hätte mein Leben gegeben, nur um diese unglaubliche Station zu sehen! Und natürlich widerstand ich allen Versuchen meiner Freunde, mich davon abzubringen, nahm mein Erspartes und machte mich auf die Reise."
languages.original_text: {n}Emerging from his reverie, he catches himself, blushes slightly, and loudly flops back onto his seat.{/n} "I apologise, I... I got carried away. But you must understand how deep an impression this booklet left on me when my young self picked it up! I simply couldn't think about anything other than Footfall. I was ready to give my life just to see this incredible station! And of course, no matter how hard my friends and loved ones tried to dissuade me, I still gathered all my savings and set out on a journey."

Aber Ihr müsst verstehen, welch tiefen Eindruck das Büchlein bei mir hinterlassen hat, als mein junges Ich es erstmals las! Ich konnte an nichts anderes als Footfall mehr denken. Ich hätte mein Leben gegeben, nur um diese unglaubliche Station zu sehen! Und natürlich widerstand ich allen Versuchen meiner Eltern, mich davon abzubringen, nahm mein Erspartes und machte mich auf die Reise."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Historian

languages.text: {n}Gordie, kendini kaptırdığı hülyalarından çıkıyor. Hafifçe yüzü kızarıyor, ardından da gürültüyle kendini sandalyesine geri bırakıyor.{/n} "Affedersiniz... Bir an dalıp gittim. Lakin gençken bu kitapçığı elime aldığımda beni ne kadar etkilediğini anlamalısınız! Binliman dışında hiçbir şeyi düşünemiyordum. Tüm hayatımı sırf bu inanılmaz istasyonu görmeye adamaya hazırdım! Hâliyle dost ve sevdiklerimin beni caydırmak için onca uğraşına rağmen tüm birikmiş paramı topladım, sonra ver elini Binliman..."
languages.original_text: {n}Emerging from his reverie, he catches himself, blushes slightly, and loudly flops back onto his seat.{/n} "I apologise, I... I got carried away. But you must understand how deep an impression this booklet left on me when my young self picked it up! I simply couldn't think about anything other than Footfall. I was ready to give my life just to see this incredible station! And of course, no matter how hard my friends and loved ones tried to dissuade me, I still gathered all my savings and set out on a journey."

traits.locale_text: {n}Gordie, dalıp gittiği hayallerden kendine geliyor, hafifçe yüzü kızarıyor, ardından da gürültüyle kendini sandalyesine geri bırakıyor.{/n} "Affedersiniz.... Bir an dalıp gittim. Gençken bu kitapçığı elime aldığımda beni ne kadar etkilediğimi anlamalısınız! Binliman dışında hiçbir şeyi düşünemiyordum. Tüm hayatımı sırf bu inanılmaz istasyonu görmeye adamaya hazırdım! Elbette arkadaşlarım ve sevdiklerim beni kararımdan döndürmek için ne kadar uğraşırsa uğraşsın, yine de tüm birikmiş paramı topladım, sonra ver elini Binliman..."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Historian
